channel.description: Recent content on qainsights | naveenkumar namachivayam

item.title: Docker JMeter Windows
item.description: This repo helps you to run Apache JMeter in your Windows container. It uses the JMeter on Windows Server Core with OpenJDK. Windows Docker for Apache JMeter

item.title: Windows Docker LoadRunner Developer
item.description: This docker image helps you to run LoadRunner Developer scripts in Windows container. LoadRunner Developer leverages DevWeb protocol, a brand new offering from Micro Focus.

item.title: Hello Performance
item.description: Hello, Performance! This website will list all my open source contributions. Thanks for stopping by.

item.title: About
item.description: 👋 My name is NaveenKumar Namachivayam. ⚡ I am a performance engineer. I break stuffs. I know nothing. ✍️ blogs at QAInsights.com 📺 my YouTube channel - https://qain.si/youtube 👨‍🏫 at Udemy Course - Performance Testing using DevWeb - https://qain.si/devweb 🌱 currently, learning Kubernetes, Docker, Rancher, Linux, and DevOps 🛠 I made PerfTractor - https://perftractor.xyz 💬 ask me anything about performance testing/engineering in QAInsights Community - https://qain.si/community ⚙ LoadRunner Professional | JMeter | NeoLoad | Dynatrace | DevOps | Docker | Kubernetes | Jenkins | Linux | GitHub Actions | Bash | Python
